review: I've been using this task management tool for a few months now. The integration with our CI/CD pipeline is a lifesaver, allowing us to track bugs right alongside feature requests. However, I've run into some stability issues; the app can be slow when dealing with larger projects, and I've experienced a few edge cases where tasks didn't sync properly. Overall, it’s decent, but if the performance issues aren't addressed, it may hinder our regression testing efforts.

This tool has been a game-changer for our product roadmap planning. The Gantt chart view makes it easy to visualize dependencies and communicate timelines to stakeholders. The custom reporting dashboard is fantastic for weekly updates. Only minor complaint is that the mobile app feels a bit clunky compared to desktop, but the collaboration features more than make up for it.

I've been using this task management tool for a couple of months now. The Kanban board feature is pretty helpful for visualizing my tasks, and the deadline reminders keep me on track. However, the learning curve was steeper than I expected, especially with the onboarding process. It took me a while to figure out how to set up projects and manage team assignments. Overall, it’s a decent tool but could use some improvements in user guidance.

I've been using this task management tool for a few weeks now, and overall, it's pretty solid. The Kanban board feature helps me visualize my tasks easily, and the time tracking is super useful for keeping tabs on my progress. The onboarding process was quite helpful, but I did find the learning curve a bit steep at first. It took me some time to get used to all the features. My only complaint is that sometimes it feels a bit slow to load, especially with larger projects.

I've been using this task management tool for a few weeks. It has a nice Kanban board feature that helps me visualize my tasks, which is great. The time tracking tool is also useful for seeing how long I spend on projects. However, the learning curve is a bit steep for me. Onboarding was okay, but I still feel lost sometimes. I think it could be simpler to navigate for someone just starting out. Overall, it's decent but not the easiest to use.

I've been using this task management tool for a few months now, and it really shines in terms of collaboration and reporting. The roadmap feature allows my team to easily visualize our project timelines, and the reporting capabilities help keep stakeholders informed on progress. However, I wish the integration with other tools was a bit smoother. Overall, it's a solid choice for managing tasks and aligning with our goals.

As a product manager, I appreciate how this task management tool streamlines collaboration with my team and stakeholders. The roadmap feature is particularly helpful for visualizing our project timelines and aligning everyone on priorities. I also love the reporting capabilities, which give me clear insights into progress and bottlenecks. However, I find the interface a bit cluttered at times, which can make it challenging to quickly navigate through tasks. Overall, it's a solid tool for managing complex projects.

As an operations manager, I've found this task management tool to be invaluable. The permissions and approval workflows ensure that only the right team members can access sensitive information, which is crucial for our projects. The automated reminders for task deadlines have improved our on-time delivery rates significantly. The only drawback I've noticed is that the initial setup can be a bit time-consuming, but once it's configured, the audit trails give us great visibility into project progress.

I've been using this task management tool for a few months now, and it's really helped me stay organized. The ability to create subtasks is a game changer for breaking down my projects. The calendar view also helps me see deadlines clearly. The onboarding process was smooth, although there was a slight learning curve at first. My only complaint is that sometimes it feels a bit overwhelming with all the features, but overall, it’s been a fantastic tool for my workflow.

We've been using TaskMaster for a few months now, and it's been a game-changer for our team's productivity. The Kanban boards are super intuitive, making it easy to visualize our workflow. The ability to assign tasks and set deadlines has helped us stay on track as we scale. Pricing is also reasonable compared to other tools out there. However, I wish the reporting features were a bit more robust; they feel a bit limited for tracking our growth over time.

We've been using this task management tool for a few months now, and it has significantly improved our workflow. The permissions management feature is excellent; I can easily control who has access to what, which is crucial for compliance. The automation of approval processes has saved us a lot of time. However, the user interface could use some polishing, as it can be a bit overwhelming for new team members. Overall, a solid tool that I would recommend!

Absolute nightmare for operations. The permission system is broken - can't set proper approval workflows and team members can edit tasks they shouldn't access. Audit trail is practically useless, just shows 'task updated' with no details. Automation rules constantly fail without notifications. Moving back to our old system ASAP.

The approval workflows are decent and audit trails capture most changes, which helps with compliance. However, the permissions system is clunky - can't set granular access controls easily. Automation rules work but are limited compared to other tools. Gets the job done but frustrating for complex ops workflows.

I've been using this task management tool for a few months now, and it's been quite helpful in tracking bugs and organizing regression tests. The custom labels feature allows me to categorize tasks by urgency, which is a lifesaver when dealing with edge cases. However, the reporting feature could use more flexibility; sometimes the generated reports don't capture all the details I need. Overall, it's a stable and efficient tool that has improved our QA workflow significantly.

Decent tool for managing our product roadmap and sprint planning. The Gantt charts are solid and stakeholder reporting features save time. However, collaboration feels clunky - comments get buried and @mentions don't always notify properly. Integration with our dev tools is limited. Works for basic PM needs but lacks the polish for complex cross-team coordination.

As a product manager, I've found this task management tool indispensable for keeping our roadmap clear and aligned with stakeholders. The ability to create customizable reporting dashboards has transformed our status updates into insightful presentations. Collaboration features like real-time commenting and task assignments ensure everyone stays on the same page. My only drawback is the initial learning curve for new team members, but once they're up to speed, it’s smooth sailing!

I've been using this task management tool for a few months now. The bug tracking feature is pretty solid, allowing me to easily log issues and track their status. However, I've encountered some stability problems when moving tasks between projects, which can lead to edge cases during regression testing. The collaboration aspect is decent, but frequent updates sometimes cause unexpected behavior. Overall, it's functional, but it needs more polish to handle complex workflows reliably.

The REST API is decent with good documentation, and Slack integration works smoothly. However, performance degrades noticeably with large task lists (500+ items), and we've experienced random 503 errors during peak hours. The webhook reliability is inconsistent - about 15% of our automated workflows fail silently. Good for small teams but struggles at scale.

Game changer for our ops team. The approval workflows are incredibly flexible - I can set up multi-level approvals for budget requests and the audit trail captures everything automatically. Love the permission granularity too. Only wish the mobile app had full admin capabilities, but that's minor compared to how much time this saves us on compliance reporting.

I had high hopes for this task management tool given its features like roadmap tracking and stakeholder reporting, but it has been a major letdown. The roadmap feature is clunky and not intuitive, making it hard to visualize progress. Additionally, collaboration tools often glitch, leading to confusion among the team. With so many options out there, I can't recommend this one. It's frustrating to use for managing tasks and keeping stakeholders informed.

I've been using this task management tool for a couple of months now, and it's been pretty helpful. The drag-and-drop feature for tasks is super intuitive, making it easy to prioritize my work. The calendar integration also helps me keep track of deadlines. However, there was a bit of a learning curve when I first started, and the onboarding process could be smoother. Overall, it's a great tool, and I'm glad I switched!

As a product manager, I was hopeful about this tool for managing our roadmap and facilitating collaboration among teams. However, I found the reporting feature to be quite limited, lacking the depth we need to analyze progress effectively. Additionally, the integration with other tools we use wasn't as seamless as promised, causing friction with stakeholders. Overall, it has potential, but it needs significant improvements to be truly useful.

As a QA engineer, I've found this task management tool to be quite effective for tracking bugs and edge cases during our sprints. The integration with our CI/CD pipeline is seamless, allowing us to create tasks directly from our test results, which saves a lot of time. However, I noticed that the reporting feature could use more flexibility in filtering and sorting tasks, especially when we have a lot of regression tests to manage. Overall, a solid tool that enhances our workflow!

I've been using this task management tool for a few months now. The integration with our bug tracking system is quite handy, allowing me to link issues directly to tasks. However, I've encountered some bugs when using the filtering feature—it doesn't always display all tasks correctly, especially with edge cases in our project. While the stability has improved over time, I'm still experiencing some regression issues that can be frustrating. Overall, it gets the job done, but it could use some polish.

I had high hopes for this task management tool, especially with its API capabilities and the promise of seamless integrations. However, the API is poorly documented, making it frustrating to work with. Additionally, the performance tends to lag during peak hours, which severely impacts my workflow. While the project tracking feature is decent, the overall reliability leaves much to be desired. I expected better for a tool that's supposed to enhance productivity.

I've been using TaskMaster for a few months now, and it's been a game changer for our QA processes. The bug tracking feature is intuitive, making it easy to log issues and track their resolution status. I also love the custom workflow automation; it helps manage edge cases without missing a beat. My only complaint is that the mobile app occasionally feels a bit sluggish. However, the overall stability and ease of use more than make up for it. Highly recommend!

We've been using this task management tool for a few months now, and it's significantly improved our workflow. The permissions feature allows me to finely tune who can see and edit various tasks, which is a game changer for maintaining security. The automation of recurring tasks has saved us a lot of time. However, I wish the audit trails were a bit more detailed; sometimes it's hard to track changes. Overall, a solid tool that enhances our operational efficiency!

I've been using TaskMaster Pro for a few months now, and it has drastically improved my team's workflow. The API is robust and allows for seamless integrations with our CI/CD tools, which is a huge plus. I love the customizability of the task statuses and the built-in reporting features; they help us track progress effectively. The only drawback is that the mobile app isn't as feature-rich as the desktop version, but overall, the reliability and performance make it a top choice.

Absolute disaster. Their REST API is completely unreliable - constant 500 errors and timeouts that break our automation. The webhook integration fails silently half the time, leaving our systems out of sync. Performance is terrible with response times over 3 seconds for simple task queries. Zero monitoring or status pages when things go down. Switching to something that actually works.

I've been using this task management tool for a few months, and while it has some solid features, it falls short in a few areas. The ability to create custom workflows is great for tracking edge cases, but I've encountered some bugs when moving tasks between boards. Additionally, the reporting feature is useful for analyzing regression testing results, but it sometimes crashes when generating reports for larger projects. Overall, it's stable enough for day-to-day use, but it definitely needs improvement.

The kanban boards work well for tracking test cases and the bulk edit feature saves time when updating ticket statuses. However, I've hit several edge cases where subtasks don't sync properly after moving parent tasks between columns. Also experienced some UI regression issues after their last update - drag and drop occasionally fails on Chrome. Stability has improved but still feels buggy for production QA workflows.

I recently started using this task management tool, and I love it! The Kanban board feature makes it super easy to visualize my tasks, and the deadline reminders have really helped me stay on track. The onboarding process was a bit overwhelming at first, but the tutorials were clear and helpful. The only downside is that sometimes the app can be a little slow to load, but it's a minor issue compared to how much it has improved my workflow!

Decent tool for basic roadmap planning and task tracking. The reporting dashboard gives stakeholders good visibility into sprint progress, and the collaboration features work well for daily standups. However, the custom field options are limited and integration with our existing tools was clunky. Gets the job done but nothing special.

The REST API is poorly documented and inconsistent - some endpoints return 200 with error messages in the body instead of proper HTTP status codes. Integration with our CI/CD pipeline breaks frequently due to rate limiting that kicks in way too aggressively. The webhook system is unreliable, missing about 15% of task updates. Performance is decent when it works, but the frequent API timeouts make it unusable for our automated workflows.

We started using this task management tool hoping it would improve our team's productivity, but it unfortunately fell short. The interface is not as intuitive as I expected, making it difficult for my team to adopt quickly. While the real-time collaboration feature is a plus, the slow loading times when we scale up tasks have caused significant delays in our workflow. Additionally, at this price point, I expected better performance and support.

This tool transformed how I manage our product roadmap. The custom reporting dashboard gives me exactly what I need for stakeholder updates, and the collaboration features keep my dev team aligned on sprint priorities. Only minor gripe is the mobile app feels sluggish, but the desktop experience is stellar.

Expected better from a task management tool. The Kanban board frequently breaks when moving cards between columns - clear regression from their last update. Filtering system is buggy too, often shows tasks that don't match criteria. Found several edge cases where subtasks disappear entirely. Stability issues make it unreliable for tracking our testing workflows.

As a QA engineer, I've found the task management tool to be somewhat helpful, but it has its fair share of bugs. The Kanban board feature is intuitive and makes tracking progress easy, but I often encounter issues with task duplication that throw off our regression testing schedules. Additionally, the reporting feature lacks the flexibility to handle edge cases in our projects, which can lead to stability issues during sprint planning. Overall, decent but needs refinement.

As a QA engineer, I rely heavily on task management tools to keep track of bugs and edge cases. This tool's tagging system is fantastic for categorizing issues, making regression testing a breeze. I also appreciate the integration with our CI/CD pipeline; it helps ensure stability across builds. One drawback is that the mobile app can occasionally be slow to sync, but overall, it has significantly improved our workflow. Highly recommend!

Been using this for 8 months across our engineering team. The REST API is solid - proper rate limiting, consistent responses, and excellent uptime (99.8% in my monitoring). Slack integration works flawlessly for automated task updates. Only gripe is the webhook delivery can be slow during peak hours, sometimes 30+ seconds delay. But overall, rock solid tool that handles our workflow automation perfectly.

We've been using this task management tool for a few months, and I'm left feeling underwhelmed. While it does offer basic approval workflows and task permissions, the automation features are clunky and not as intuitive as I had hoped. Additionally, the audit trails are often incomplete, making it hard to track changes effectively. In a role where oversight is crucial, these issues are pretty disappointing. I expected a lot more from a dedicated SaaS solution.

We've been using this task management tool for about six months now. The automation features are helpful for streamlining our repetitive tasks, and I appreciate the detailed audit trails which make compliance easier. However, I've found the permissions management to be a bit confusing, especially when assigning tasks to new team members. The approvals process could also use some improvement, as it doesn't always notify the right people efficiently. Overall, it's decent but has room for improvement.

Solid task management tool with excellent API coverage. The REST endpoints are well-documented and the webhook integrations work flawlessly with our CI/CD pipeline. Love the bulk operations feature for managing sprint tasks. Only minor gripe is the rate limiting could be more generous for enterprise plans, but reliability has been rock solid for 8+ months.

As a QA engineer, I've tried various task management tools, but this one truly stands out. The bug tracking feature is seamless, allowing me to log issues directly linked to specific tasks. The ability to create custom workflows also helps in managing edge cases effectively. The only drawback I've noticed is the occasional lag when loading large projects, but overall, the stability it offers for regression testing is impressive. Highly recommend it for teams focused on quality assurance!

Pretty solid tool for managing my dev tasks. The kanban boards are super intuitive and I love the time tracking feature - helps me see where I'm spending too much time. Onboarding was smooth with good tutorials. Only complaint is the mobile app feels clunky compared to desktop. Still learning all the shortcuts but overall makes my workflow way better.

I've been using this task management tool for a few months now, and I can't imagine our operations without it. The ability to set granular permissions for team members has greatly improved our workflow, and the automated approval processes save us so much time. I also appreciate the audit trails that let us easily track changes and hold team members accountable. My only complaint is the learning curve for new users, but once they get the hang of it, it's a game changer.

I've been using this task management tool for the past six months, and it's been a game-changer for our team's collaboration and roadmap planning. The Gantt chart feature allows us to visualize project timelines effectively, and the reporting tools help us keep stakeholders informed about progress. However, I do wish the integration with our existing CRM was a bit smoother, as it sometimes creates extra manual work. Overall, it's a solid choice for managing tasks and projects.

The REST API is solid and well-documented, which made integrating with our CI/CD pipeline straightforward. Task automation rules work as expected. However, the webhook reliability has been inconsistent - we've had about 15% failure rate on deliveries without proper retry logic. Performance is decent for our team of 12, but I'd be concerned about scaling. The Slack integration works well though.

I've been using this task management tool for our team for a few months now, and it has significantly improved our workflow. The automation features for task assignments and reminders are fantastic, saving us a lot of time. I also appreciate the customizable permissions and approval processes, which help maintain accountability. However, the reporting dashboard could be more intuitive; it takes some time to find the right data. Overall, a solid tool for managing operations.

The REST API is decent with proper rate limiting, and the Slack integration works reliably. However, webhook delivery can be inconsistent - we've had issues with missed notifications during high load periods. The GraphQL endpoint would be nice but they only offer REST. Performance is okay for our team of 12, but the UI feels sluggish compared to competitors.

I've been using TaskMaster for a few weeks now, and it's been a game changer! The Kanban boards help me visualize my tasks easily, and the calendar integration means I never miss a deadline. The onboarding process was a bit overwhelming at first, with so many features to explore, but the tutorials really helped. My only drawback is that the mobile app could be more user-friendly. Overall, I love it and would highly recommend it!

I've been using TaskPro for a few months now, and I must say, it has greatly improved our team's workflow. The API is robust and allows seamless integration with our CI/CD pipeline, which is a game changer. I also appreciate the custom automations that save us time on repetitive tasks. My only minor drawback is that the mobile app can be a bit laggy at times, but overall, the reliability and performance of the desktop version more than make up for it.

As an operations manager, I've tried numerous task management tools, but this one stands out. The granular permissions and approval workflows are a game changer for keeping our projects secure and compliant. I love the automation features that reduce manual work, like auto-assigning tasks based on team availability. My only slight drawback is the learning curve for new users, but once they get the hang of it, it's incredibly efficient. Highly recommend for teams focusing on accountability and visibility!

We've been using this task management tool for a few months now, and while it has potential, it's not quite hitting the mark for us. The permissions settings are robust, which helps with team access control, and the audit trails are a lifesaver for tracking changes. However, the approval workflow automation is clunky and often requires manual follow-ups. Overall, it saves some time but still needs refinement to truly streamline our operations.

Absolute disaster for ops teams. The permissions system is broken - I can't restrict task editing to specific roles, so anyone can modify critical workflows. Audit trail feature barely works - half the changes aren't logged. Approval workflows constantly glitch out, leaving tasks stuck in limbo. Support is unresponsive. Moving to another platform ASAP.

The REST API is well-documented and their Slack integration works reliably. Performance is decent for our team of 12. However, the webhook implementation is flaky - we get duplicate events about 10% of the time which breaks our automated workflows. Also missing proper bulk operations in the API. It gets the job done but feels half-baked for serious automation needs.

Finally found a task management tool that gets enterprise needs right. The permission system is granular - I can control who sees what at the project level. Approval workflows are seamless and the audit trail captures every change with timestamps. Only complaint is the mobile app feels clunky compared to desktop, but the automation features more than make up for it.

I have been extremely disappointed with this task management tool. The roadmap feature is clunky and lacks the flexibility we need to adapt to changing priorities. Additionally, the reporting functionality is limited and doesn't provide the insights required for our stakeholders. Collaboration is also a struggle, as updates don’t sync in real-time, causing confusion among the team. Overall, this tool has hindered our workflow rather than improving it.

Terrible experience. The permissions system is completely broken - can't set granular access controls for different team levels. Approval workflows constantly fail and tasks get stuck in limbo. No proper audit trail either, so compliance is a nightmare. Support is useless. Looking for alternatives immediately.

Solid task management tool for our QA team. The automated regression testing integration and custom workflow templates work great for tracking bug lifecycles. However, I've hit some edge cases where subtask dependencies don't update correctly after parent task status changes. Also experienced occasional sync issues between mobile and web versions. Overall stable, but needs polish on these corner cases.

As a QA engineer, I had high hopes for this task management tool, but it falls short. The bugs often disrupt my workflow, especially when assigning tasks to multiple team members. The 'comment' feature is supposed to facilitate discussions, but it frequently crashes, leading to data loss. I also encountered edge cases where previously completed tasks would reappear, affecting our regression testing process. Overall, I find the stability lacking, which is crucial for our team.

As an operations manager, I've been using this task management tool for a few months now. The permissions feature is quite robust, allowing me to set specific access levels for my team, which is a must for us. I also appreciate the automation capabilities that help streamline our approval processes. However, I've noticed that the audit trails could be more detailed; they sometimes lack the granularity we need for compliance purposes. Overall, it’s decent, but there’s room for improvement.

I've been using this task management tool for a couple of months now, and it's been pretty helpful. I love the Kanban board feature; it really helps me visualize my tasks. The integration with GitHub is also a lifesaver for tracking code-related tasks. However, the onboarding process was a bit challenging for me as a junior dev, and I felt there could be more tutorials for beginners. Overall, it's a solid tool that I recommend!

Absolute disaster for enterprise use. The permissions system is broken - can't properly restrict task visibility by department. Approval workflows constantly fail and there's zero audit trail when tasks get modified or deleted. Their automation rules don't work half the time. Moving to a different platform ASAP.

I've been using this task management tool for several months now, and it has truly transformed my workflow. The bug tracking feature is incredibly intuitive, allowing me to document and prioritize edge cases effortlessly. I also appreciate the regression testing checklist that integrates with our tasks, ensuring nothing slips through the cracks. One minor drawback is the initial learning curve for some advanced features, but the stability and performance are worth it!

Been using this for 6 months tracking our sprint work. The custom field validation is solid - haven't found any edge cases that break it yet. API endpoints are stable, no regressions after updates. Bulk operations handle large datasets without timing out. Only complaint is the search filters can be slow with 1000+ tasks, but overall very reliable for our QA workflows.

I've been using this task management tool for a few months now. While I appreciate the ability to create custom workflows and the integration with our CI/CD pipeline, I've run into several bugs during testing. The reporting feature also feels a bit clunky, especially when trying to track edge cases in our regression tests. It's stable most of the time, but I hope they address these issues soon. Overall, it's useful, but it definitely needs improvements.

As a product manager, I appreciate the visual roadmap feature for aligning our team and stakeholders, but I've found the reporting capabilities a bit lacking. While it’s great for collaboration, tracking progress across multiple projects can be cumbersome. The integration with our existing tools is helpful, but without more robust analytics, it’s hard to justify the investment. Overall, it gets the job done, but there’s room for improvement.

As a new dev, I found the kanban boards really helpful for tracking my tasks and the time tracking feature is solid. But honestly, the onboarding was pretty confusing - took me like a week to figure out how to set up proper workflows. The UI feels cluttered too. It works okay once you get used to it, but the learning curve is steeper than I expected for a task management tool.

I've been using this task management tool for the past six months, and it has genuinely improved our team's workflow. The ability to create custom fields allows us to track bugs and edge cases more effectively, and the integration with our CI/CD pipeline has made regression testing smoother. The only drawback is the initial learning curve for new team members, but once they get the hang of it, everything runs like clockwork. Highly recommend it for any QA team!

I've been using this task management tool for a few weeks now, and overall it's pretty solid. The Kanban board feature helps me visualize my tasks, which is a game changer for staying organized. Also, the integration with GitHub makes it easy to track my code progress. The onboarding took a bit longer than I expected, and I found the learning curve a little steep at first. But once I got the hang of it, it really improved my workflow. Just wish there were more templates available.

As an operations manager, I was hoping this task management tool would streamline our processes. While the audit trails and permissions settings are robust, which is a plus, I found the approval workflows to be clunky and not user-friendly. Automation features are limited and don’t integrate well with our existing systems, leading to more manual work than I anticipated. Overall, it hasn't met our expectations and feels like it complicates rather than simplifies our operations.

I've been using this task management tool for a few months now. The ability to create custom workflows and track issues is a plus, but I’ve run into bugs with the notifications; they don’t always trigger as expected. I also noticed edge cases where tasks don’t update their status correctly after a regression test is completed, which is frustrating. The overall stability is decent, but it could use more polish to avoid these hiccups. It gets the job done, but it's not reliable enough for critical projects.

As a senior backend engineer, I've been using this task management tool for a few months, and I must say, the API integration is a standout feature. It allows for seamless communication with our existing systems, which has boosted our workflow significantly. The real-time collaboration feature is also quite reliable, keeping team members in sync without any hiccups. However, I found the reporting capabilities a bit lacking; more customization options would be appreciated. Overall, it's a solid choice for our team.

I've been using this task management tool for our product roadmap and it's been a game-changer for collaboration with my team and stakeholders. The timeline view helps in visualizing project phases, and the reporting feature gives me insights into task progress, making it easier to update upper management. However, I wish the integration with other tools was more seamless; it can be tricky to sync with our existing systems. Overall, a solid tool that enhances our workflow.

I had high hopes for this task management tool, especially with features like permissions and custom approval workflows. However, it falls short on audit trails, which makes tracking accountability difficult. The automation features are a nice touch, but they often break down during critical tasks, leading to missed deadlines. Overall, it seems to lack the reliability we need in our operations, and I can't confidently recommend it.

The Kanban boards work well for tracking test cases and the automated notifications are helpful. However, I've encountered several edge cases where bulk task updates fail silently - no error message, just nothing happens. Also found a regression where filtering by custom fields breaks after sorting. Stability is inconsistent, especially with larger datasets. Decent for basic workflow but needs more polish for production QA teams.

Been testing this for our team and found multiple critical issues. The task filtering breaks when you have more than 50 items - classic pagination bug. Bulk edit operations cause data inconsistency, especially with due dates. Had a regression where completed tasks disappeared after the last update. The API integration is unstable and times out frequently. Too many edge cases not handled properly for production use.

Been using this for 8 months across our dev team. The REST API is rock solid - we've built custom integrations with our CI/CD pipeline and Slack notifications without any hiccups. Real-time sync actually works unlike some competitors. Only gripe is the webhook payload format could be more flexible, but their uptime has been flawless.

Absolutely terrible stability. The drag-and-drop feature breaks constantly - tasks disappear mid-drag or end up in wrong columns. Even worse, the API integration has major regression issues after their last update. Can't sync with our bug tracker anymore. Edge case handling is nonexistent - try creating a task with special characters and watch it crash. Completely unreliable for any serious workflow.

This tool has transformed our workflow management. The granular permissions system lets me control exactly who can approve what, and the audit trail feature is a lifesaver for compliance reviews. Automated task routing based on priority rules saves hours weekly. Only minor gripe is the mobile app feels a bit clunky compared to desktop, but the core functionality is solid.

The automation workflows looked promising but they're clunky and often fail without clear error messages. Permission settings are confusing - took me hours to figure out approval chains. The audit trail exists but it's buried in menus and hard to export. Customer support is slow. Looking for alternatives.

Been using this for 6 months to track our testing cycles. The automated task dependencies and custom field validation are solid - haven't found any edge cases that break them yet. Great API stability for our CI integration. Only minor gripe is the bulk edit feature occasionally has UI lag with 500+ tasks, but nothing that impacts core functionality.

I had high hopes for this task management tool given its touted integrations and API capabilities. While the API does allow for some custom workflows, I found it lacking in documentation, making implementation frustrating. Additionally, the tool's performance suffered during peak usage times, causing delays in task updates. Unfortunately, its reliability did not meet my expectations—more often than not, tasks would fail to sync across platforms. Overall, not worth the investment for my team's needs.

As a QA engineer, I've found this task management tool incredibly effective for tracking bugs and edge cases. The ability to create custom workflows and assign tasks to team members has streamlined our regression testing process significantly. I especially appreciate the integration with our CI/CD pipeline, which helps us monitor stability in real time. The only drawback is that the mobile app could use some improvement in terms of functionality, but overall, it's a game-changer for our team.

As a product manager, I was hopeful about using this task management tool, especially for its roadmap and reporting features. However, I've found the roadmap functionality to be somewhat limited, lacking the flexibility needed to adjust priorities based on stakeholder feedback. The reporting is also quite basic and doesn't provide the insights I need for effective collaboration. Overall, it feels like the tool needs more robust features to truly support my team's dynamic workflow.

Absolutely terrible for product management. The roadmap view is completely broken - can't drag items between quarters and it crashes constantly. Reporting is a joke - no burndown charts or velocity tracking. Stakeholders can't even view projects without editing permissions. Collaboration features are non-existent. Switching to Jira next week.

Been using this for 6 months with my 8-person team. The kanban boards are solid and task dependencies work well for sprint planning. But at $12/user/month it's pricey for bootstrapped startups. Performance gets sluggish with 500+ tasks loaded. Good for basic workflow but lacks advanced automation we need as we scale.

I had high hopes for this task management tool, but it has been a huge disappointment. The permissions setup is overly complicated, making it difficult to give team members the access they need without compromising security. The approval workflows are clunky and often get stuck, which slows everything down. I also expected robust audit trails, but the reporting features are limited and not user-friendly. Overall, it feels like there’s a lot of potential that just isn’t being realized.

I've been using this task management tool for a few months now, and it's been a game-changer for my workflow.
